author: rangadi
msg: HADOOP-4797. Improve how RPC server reads and writes large buffers. Avoids
soft-leak of direct buffers and excess copies in NIO layer. (Raghu Angadi)

author: jdumay
msg: map variables should be final if they are to be used with the synchronized keyword
